TTP.placeholderHelp-grandTotal: The total of the estimate. Example - {{grandTotal}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-grandTotal_net: The total of the estimate (Net (without discounts/surcharges)). Example - {{grandTotal_net}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-grandTotal_gross: The total of the estimate (Gross (with discounts/surcharges)). Example - {{grandTotal_gross}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-section: The name of the section/group. Example - {{section&lv=2&pos=odd}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-sectionTotal_net: Total cost per section. (Net (without discounts/surcharges)) Example - {{sectionTotal_net&lv=2&end}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-sectionTotal_gross: Total cost per section. (Gross (with discounts/surcharges)) Example - {{sectionTotal_gross&lv=2&end}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-count: The sequence number of the product/service. Example - {{count}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-title: The name of the product/service/work. Example - {{art}}. {{title}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-units: The unit of measure for the product/service/work. Example - ({{amount}} {{units}}) = (50 pieces)
TTP.placeholderHelp-value: The cost per unit of goods/service/work. Example - {{amount}} x {{value}} = {{total}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-value_net: Cost per unit of goods/service/work (Net (without discounts/surcharges)) Example - {{amount}} x {{value_net}} = {{total_net}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-value_gross: The cost per unit of goods/service/work. (Gross (with discounts/ mark-ups)) Example - {{amount}} x {{value_gross}} = {{total_gross}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-value_percent: Percentage of discount/markup on the cost of goods/services/work. Example - {{value_net}} + {{value_percent}} = {{value_gross}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-value_ratio: The multiplier for applying a discount/penalty to the cost of the product/service/work. Example - {{value_net}} x {{value_ratio}}  = {{value_gross}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-total: The total cost of the good/work/service. Example - {{total}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-total_net: The total cost of the good/work/service. (Net (without discounts/ mark-ups)) Example - {{total_net}}
TTP.placeholderHelp-total_gross: The total cost of the good/work/service. (Gross (with discounts/surcharges)) Example - {{total_gross}}
TTP.attributeHelp-pos:
Sets link of the template string to the sequence number of the element (used for changing of the elements display depending on the sequence number, for example for alternation of the rows colour) (one string can use only one property pos on one of the variables)
Possible values: (1-9999) or (odd,even,first,last)
Example:
{section&lv=2&pos=first}} - String template for every first section of the second nesting layer
{title&pos=odd}} - template for all odd list items in the current section
TTP.attributeHelp-pin:
Lock relative position of a line (or set of lines) in the template (used mainly for changing the lines order and set together with the pos property to specify the sequence number of the line being locked) (only one property pin can be used in one line on one of the variables)
Possible values: -
Example:
{section&lv=2&pos=3&pin}} - Fix this location in the template for section #2 of the second nesting level
{title&pos=3&pin}} - fix this place for the 3rd line of the item list
TTP.attributeHelp-rb:
Capture rows before the current row ( rb - rows before ) ( Attention!!! - Captured ranges of rows must not overlap with other iterated rows or captured ranges) (only one property rb on one of the variables can be used in one row)
Possible values: (1-100)
For example:
{{section&rb=3}} - Will grab 3 lines before the current line and insert them at the beginning of a new section each time
{title&rb=1}} - captures one line before the current line for each element
TTP.attributeHelp-ra:
Capture rows after current row ( ra - rows after ) ( Attention!!! - Captured ranges of rows must not overlap with other iterated rows or captured ranges) (only one property ra on one of the variables can be used in one row)
Possible values: (1-100)
For example:
{{sectionTotal&end&ra=5}} - Will grab 5 lines after the current line and insert them at the end of the section each time
{title&ra=1}} - Captures one line after the current line for each element
TTP.attributeHelp-hide:
Hide whole line ( and everything captured with it using rb and/or ra properties )
Available values: -
Example: {{section&hide}} | {{title&hide}}

ERROR.template_missing_row: There is no row for the element
ERROR.template_instance_lost: Template not found on the server
ERROR.cannot_use_protected: It is not possible to use the word section for an arbitrary variable
ERROR.unexpected_iterable_placeholder_option: Unexpected property for a variable (see help)
ERROR.cannot_use_options_for_static_placeholde: For static variables you cannot use the property
ERROR.cannot_be_both_start_end: Conflict of positions (beginning/end of a section)
ERROR.only_one_level: There can only be one section level
ERROR.string_level_row: The level of the section should be a number
ERROR.zero_level_row: The section level must be greater than zero
ERROR.only_one_pos: There can only be one property of a variable position
ERROR.zero_pos_row: There is no such thing as a zero position
ERROR.invalid_pos_row: Incorrect value of the variable position
ERROR.only_one_number_of_rows_to_take: Incorrect indication of the number of strings involved
ERROR.unexpected_number_of_rows_to_take: Incorrect indication of the number of strings involved
ERROR.string_number_of_rows_to_take: Incorrect indication of the number of strings involved
ERROR.cannot_take_zero_rows: Incorrect indication of the number of strings involved
ERROR.unknown_compatibility_row_found: Incompatible variables within the same string
ERROR.incompatible_row_placeholders: Incompatible variables within the same string
ERROR.incompatible_level_placeholders: Level-incompatible variables within the same sectional string
ERROR.incompatible_start_end_placeholders: Incompatible variables within one section string
ERROR.incompatible_take_rows_before_placeholde: Incompatible variables within the same string
ERROR.incompatible_take_rows_after_placeholder: Incompatible variables within the same string
ERROR.cannot_mix_pinned_with_variative_pos: It is not possible to set variable positions to a fixed section
ERROR.item_cannot_have_level: Unable to set the level for an item variable (only for a section)
